iaProofInfo: IAProof is an option that makes the watermark resistant to AI.
imageResizeInfo: Resizing the image optimizes processing time. If you wish to retain the original image quality, disable this option.
advancedModeInfo: Advanced mode allows you to control more parameters for the watermark.
removeMetadataInfo: Remove image metadata to increase image privacy
bySeb2devInfo: Adds a By Seb2Dev watermark to the bottom right of the image
